title: How to Speak Without Spitting Saliva

steps.title: Practice in front of a mirror.
steps.content: Practice in front of a mirror. This also helps with conquering lisps, stuttering, and most other speech problems. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tell yourself you are going to fix the problem.
steps.content: Tell yourself you are going to fix the problem. Self motivation is big in this. [2] X Research source Saying affirmations loudly and hearing them has a powerful impact. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Always swallow before you speak.
steps.content: Always swallow before you speak. This almost always eliminates most of the problem. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Don't speak too fast.
steps.content: Don't speak too fast. Speaking fast always increases the risk of spitting. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Always be confident!
steps.content: Always be confident ! Being confident and believing in yourself is the key to getting over any problem (except overconfidence). [6] X Research source
